section.title: Console Alarms
section.para: These alarms show under the Console section of the HPE Helion Ops Console.

entry.para: Review logs in /var/log/ops-console and logs in /var/log/apache2. Restart ops-console by running the following commands on the lifecycle manager:
entry.screen: cd ~/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts ops-console-stop.yml ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts ops-console-start.yml

entry.para: Alarms when the specified process is not running.
